title: Social Adaptation Support Program for Youth with Intellectual and Developmental Disabilities Using Wearable Technology

context.additional_context: Customized educational program based on integrated learning design conducted in smartphone-centric, limited technological environments.

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform daily tasks with 80% or higher accuracy using a smartwatch-based app
Learners successfully apply time management and self-regulation skills in three or more observed instances through a multi-prompt system
Learners can improve participation in educational activities by 70% or more through a reward system and positive behavior reinforcement
Learners demonstrate problem-solving strategies in social contexts at least twice through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
